response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value to us at $1,200,000. We understand its significance to you and would like to extend this exclusive offer at a price we believe to be mutually beneficial. We propose to sell the product to you for $1,100,000. This price reflects our commitment to fair trade while ensuring a reasonable profit margin for us. We are confident that this offer will meet your expectations and aligns closely with the perceived value of the product. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of doing business with you.", "product_price": 1100000}
